mapper.select: select * from order_item i, m_product p, m_employee e, order_head h where i.product_cd=p.product_cd and h.order_no=i.order_no and h.employee_cd=e.employee_cd and i.order_no = #{orderNo}

select distinct * from order_head h, order_item i, m_product p, m_employee e, m_buyer b where h.order_no=i.order_no and i.product_cd=p.product_cd and h.employee_cd=e.employee_cd and h.buyer_cd=b.buyer_cd order by h.orderdate desc , h.order_no asc

select distinct * from order_head h, order_item i, m_product p, m_employee e, m_buyer b
h.order_no=i.order_no and i.product_cd=p.product_cd and h.employee_cd=e.employee_cd and h.buyer_cd=b.buyer_cd
and h.order_no like '%' || #{orderNo} || '%'
and b.buyer_cd like '%' || #{buyerCd} || '%'
and h.orderdate between #{orderFromDate} and #{orderToDate}
and e.employee_cd like '%' || #{employeeCd} || '%'
and h.status like '%' || #{status} || '%'
and h.signemp_cd like '%' || #{signempCd} || '%'
and b.country_cd like '%' || #{countryCd} || '%'
order by h.orderdate desc , h.order_no asc
